recipe.title: Muesli with Pomegranate and Almonds
instructions: Combine oats, apple juice, and 1/2 cup water in a large bowl; cover and chill overnight. Mix yogurt into soaked oats. Divide mixture among bowls and, dividing evenly, top with pomegranate seeds and almonds. Drizzle with honey, if desired.
